**Notice of Opportunity for Tender**

**Project:** Flat Forms
**Solicitation Number:** 1000485371
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Category:** Service
** Date of Publication:** February 15, 2024

**Scope of Work:**

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) invites interested suppliers to submit proposals to provide the following services:

* Production of flat forms for various CRA programs
* Supply of paper products containing a minimum of 30% post-consumer waste (PCW) or virgin fiber from sustainably-managed forests
* Delivery of forms in either English or French, or both languages
* Packaging of forms in new, uniform shipping cartons to ensure stability during transportation and storage
* All paper products must be certified to a third-party verified forest certification standard, such as the Canadian Standards Association Sustainable Forest Management Standard (CSA/SFMS), the Forestry Stewardship Council (FSC), or the Sustainable Forestry Initiative (SFI)

**Estimated Annual Impressions:**

13 million impressions, with a yearly production time range of 4 to 20 working days.

**Contract Period and Options:**

The contract will be for a period of 2 years with an option to extend for up to 3 additional years. Suppliers who are selected for award will be required to provide services for a minimum guarantee of $25,000 (inclusive of taxes) in the first year.

**Vendors must meet the following Eligibility Criteria:**

* Be a supplier holding a valid Registration & Vendor Database (CRD) profile;
* Comply with applicable laws and regulations in Canada;
* Comply with all subcontracting and reseller requirements;
* Have a system in place to ensure the Confidentiality and Non-Disclosure of the information for CRA's sensitive business; and,
* Agrees to be dependent and uphold all specifications, rules, and regulations everyday under the collaborative venture.

**Submission Requirements:**

We ask interested suppliers to submit their proposals electronically via the eTendering website at canadabuys.canada.ca. Proposals must be submitted by April 22, 2024 at 2:00:00 PM Eastern Time (ET).

**Contact Information:**

For any questions or clarification, please contact Michael Yaehne, Senior Supply/Business Analyst, at (613) 291-3146 or by email at Michael.Yaehne@cra-arc.gc.ca.
